attributes.action: make politicians sign a contract of employment.
attributes.additional_details:
All politicians should have to sign a written contract of employment just as everyone else does. They also need to be assessed and reviewed every 6 months in order to make sure that they are adhering to the terms of their manifesto which the public expect themslevs have  to adhere to. Politician's pay should be related to the lowest paid workers in society so that if the politicians pay is allowed to rise then so should the lowest paid by the same 'amount',
.Their pay scales should be determined by a publicley elected body and the hours they do in Parliament and the hours they do in public office all accounted for.They should be required to account for their time spent, and be able to prove it.
.All travel expenses and pay should be determined by a public audited body elected by the public vote.
